document.full_text: dozens of bodies littered the streets of an abidjan neighborhood on tuesday as fighting continued between ivory coast troops and the remnants of a militia loyal to deposed leader laurent gbagbo.
document.title: dozens dead as ivorian troops clash with militia
lines_and_colors: dozens of bodies littered the streets of an abidjan neighborhood on tuesday as fighting continued between ivory coast troops and the remnants of a militia loyal to deposed leader laurent gbagbo.
